mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, ARCHIVE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, TOTAL_FILE_CNT, REMAIN_FILE_CNT
mapper.insert:
insert into t_archive_store
ID,
APP_ID,
ARCHIVE_TYPE,
FILE_NAME,
TOTAL_FILE_CNT,
REMAIN_FILE_CNT,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remainFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_archive_store
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVE_TYPE = #{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_FILE_CNT = #{totalFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMAIN_FILE_CNT = #{remainFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_archive_store set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARCHIVE_TYPE = #{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_FILE_CNT = #{totalFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMAIN_FILE_CNT = #{remainFileCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*, b1.DICT_DATA_NAME as ARCHIVE_TYPE_DESC, b2.DICT_DATA_NAME as FILE_NAME_DESC from t_archive_store a left join SYS_DICT_DATA b1 on b1.DICT_DATA_CODE = a.ARCHIVE_TYPE left join SYS_DICT_DATA b2 on b2.DICT_DATA_CODE = a.FILE_NAME where a.APP_ID = #{appId} order by b1.SHOW_SEQ,b2.SHOW_SEQ
